Facebook Lead Spam Reduction Checklist

Stop Wasting Ad Spend on Junk Leads (7-Minute Implementation Guide)

STEP 1: Form Settings (Do This First)

Lead Form Quality Setting:

Custom Questions to Add (Choose 2-3):

STEP 2: Placement Exclusions

Turn OFF These Placements (If Lead Quality is Poor):

How to Check: Go to Ads Manager → Breakdown → By Placement → Check CPL by placement after 50+ leads

STEP 3: Audience Exclusions

Exclude These Audiences:

For B2B Specifically, Also Exclude:

STEP 4: Targeting Refinements

Use These Targeting Methods (in order of preference):

Avoid These:
Broad interest targeting without exclusions
Lookalikes based on all leads (includes spam)

STEP 5: CRM & Follow-Up Setup

Speed-to-Contact = Quality Filter:

Why This Matters: Real leads respond fast. Spam leads don't. Fast follow-up naturally filters quality.

STEP 6: Track the RIGHT Metrics

Stop Tracking Just CPL. Track These Instead:

Set Up This Tracking:

STEP 7: Creative Best Practices

Use These Ad Formats (Ranked by Quality):

Copy That Filters Quality:

Example:
Bad: "Get more leads for your business"
Good: "Cut IT costs by 30% for mid-market SaaS companies spending $50K+/year"

BENCHMARKS: What's "Good"?

Lead Quality Metrics:

  • Qualified Lead Rate: 40-60% (if lower, revisit Steps 1-3)
  • Lead-to-Appointment: 20-40% for warm audiences, 5-15% for cold
  • Facebook CPL: $30-$150 depending on industry (B2B typically $50-$100)
If You're Getting <30% Qualified Leads:
→ Add more custom questions (Step 1)
→ Exclude Audience Network (Step 2)
→ Tighten targeting (Step 4)

QUICK ACTION PLAN

Do This Today (30 minutes):

  1. Change form quality to "Higher Intent" + add 2 questions
  2. Exclude Audience Network placement
  3. Exclude "job seekers" interest

Do This This Week:

  1. Set up CRM integration for instant lead routing
  2. Create custom audiences to exclude (customers, competitors)
  3. Start tracking Cost per Qualified Lead

Do This This Month:

  1. Build Lookalike audiences from qualified leads only
  2. Test video creative if not already using
  3. Implement 1-hour follow-up SLA

Need Help?

If you're still getting >50% spam leads after implementing this checklist, I can review your account.
